headline: Looking At The Narrative For Deutsche Post DHL Group As Cost Story Meets Rerated Shares
summary: Why Deutsche Post’s Fair Value Narrative Is Shifting The modest move in Deutsche Post’s fair value estimate, from €44.84 to €45.24 per share, reflects a tug of war between optimism on execution and caution on how much more upside is already priced in. On the supportive side, better cost control, steadier peak season trends, and the backing of more defensive segments are helping analysts feel comfortable with a slightly higher target. At the same time, concerns about already rerated valuation...
